Protocols/IotaDebuggable.html.name: IotaDebuggable
Protocols/IotaDebuggable.html.abstract: Used to enable/disable the debug IotaKit, enabling it, all the debug messages that come from IotaKit will start with [IotaKit] prefix.

Structs/IotaChecksum.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.name: removeChecksumFromAddress(_:)
Structs/IotaChecksum.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.abstract: Removes the checksum from an address. NB: The address will be not verified.

Structs/IotaChecksum.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.name: isValidChecksum(address:)
Structs/IotaChecksum.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.abstract: Checks if an address contains a valid checksum.

Structs/IotaChecksum.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.name: isAddressWithChecksum(address:)
Structs/IotaChecksum.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.abstract: Checks if is an address with checksum.

Structs/IotaChecksum.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.name: isAddressWithoutChecksum(address:)
Structs/IotaChecksum.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.abstract: Checks if is an address without checksum.

Classes/IotaConverter.html#/s:7IotaKit0A.name: string(fromTrits:)
Classes/IotaConverter.html#/s:7IotaKit0A.abstract: Converts an Array of Trits to String.

Classes/IotaConverter.html#/s:7IotaKit0A.name: trits(fromString:)
Classes/IotaConverter.html#/s:7IotaKit0A.abstract: Converts a String to an Array of Trits.

Structs/IotaUnitsConverter.html#/s:7Iota.name: convert(amount:toUnit:)
Structs/IotaUnitsConverter.html#/s:7Iota.abstract: Converts from Iota to the specified unit.

Structs/IotaUnitsConverter.html#/s:7Iota.name: convert(amount:fromUnit:toUnit:)
Structs/IotaUnitsConverter.html#/s:7Iota.abstract: Converts from arbitrary unit to the specified unit.

Structs/IotaUnitsConverter.html#/s:7Iota.name: iotaToString(amount:extended:forceUnit:)
Structs/IotaUnitsConverter.html#/s:7Iota.abstract: Converts Iota amount to human readable string.

Structs/IotaAPIUtils.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.name: newAddress(seed:index:checksum:security:multithreaded:)
Structs/IotaAPIUtils.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.abstract: Generates a new address from a seed and a given index.

Structs/IotaAPIUtils.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.name: groupTxsByBundle(_:)
Structs/IotaAPIUtils.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.abstract: Groups a list of transactions by bundle.

Structs/IotaAPIUtils.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.name: categorizeTransfers(addresses:)
Structs/IotaAPIUtils.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.abstract: Categorizes the transfers into sent and received.

Structs/IotaAPIUtils.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.name: categorizeTransfers(bundles:addresses:)
Structs/IotaAPIUtils.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.abstract: Categorizes the transfers into sent and received.

Structs/IotaAPIUtils.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.name: historyTransactions(addresses:)
Structs/IotaAPIUtils.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.abstract: Creates a transactions history from the addresses.

Classes/IotaConverter.html.name: IotaConverter
Classes/IotaConverter.html.abstract: Iota Converter utils, used to convert trytes, trits to/from String and other kinds of conversion.

Protocols/IotaLocalPoW.html.name: IotaLocalPoW
Protocols/IotaLocalPoW.html.abstract: Protocol for Iota Local Proof of Work, all the implementations for PoW can implement this protocol in order to be used in Iota client.

Structs/IotaAddress.html#/s:7IotaKit0A7A.name: balance
Structs/IotaAddress.html#/s:7IotaKit0A7A.abstract: The current balance of the address, if nil, it can be derived from the list of transactions. In that case there is no guarantee that the value is updated.

Structs/IotaAddress.html#/s:7IotaKit0A7A.name: canSpend
Structs/IotaAddress.html#/s:7IotaKit0A7A.abstract: Determines if an addres can be spent or not.

Structs/IotaSignature.html#/s:7IotaKit0A.name: address
Structs/IotaSignature.html#/s:7IotaKit0A.abstract: The address where the signature comes from.

Structs/IotaBundle.html#/s:7IotaKit0A6Bu.name: transactions
Structs/IotaBundle.html#/s:7IotaKit0A6Bu.abstract: List of transactions contained in the bundle.

Structs/IotaBundle.html#/s:7IotaKit0A6Bu.name: length
Structs/IotaBundle.html#/s:7IotaKit0A6Bu.abstract: The total number of transactions contained in the bundle.

Structs/IotaBundle.html#/s:7IotaKit0A6Bu.name: addEntry(signatureMessageLength:address:value:tag:timestamp:)
Structs/IotaBundle.html#/s:7IotaKit0A6Bu.abstract: Adds an entry to the Iota Bundle.

Structs/IotaTransfer.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.name: timestamp
Structs/IotaTransfer.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.abstract: The timestamp (only if stored in the tangle).

Structs/IotaTransfer.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.name: hash
Structs/IotaTransfer.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.abstract: The hash (only if stored in the tangle).

Structs/IotaTransaction.html#/s:7IotaKit.name: attachmentTimestampLowerBound
Structs/IotaTransaction.html#/s:7IotaKit.abstract: The lower bound of the attachment timestamp.

Structs/IotaTransaction.html#/s:7IotaKit.name: attachmentTimestampUpperBound
Structs/IotaTransaction.html#/s:7IotaKit.abstract: The upper bound of the attachment timestamp.

Structs/IotaTransaction.html#/s:7IotaKit.name: transactionObject(trytes:)
Structs/IotaTransaction.html#/s:7IotaKit.abstract: Converts a valid Trytes to a IotaTransaction object.

Structs/IotaTransaction.html#/s:7IotaKit.name: trytes
Structs/IotaTransaction.html#/s:7IotaKit.abstract: Returns a String of Trytes from the current state.

Structs/IotaHistoryTransaction.html#/s:7.name: transactions
Structs/IotaHistoryTransaction.html#/s:7.abstract: List of transactions list, each array represent a reattach.

Structs/IotaAccount.html.name: IotaAccount
Structs/IotaAccount.html.abstract: Iota account, used to return all the info for an account like the balance or addresses

Structs/IotaHistoryTransaction.html.name: IotaHistoryTransaction
Structs/IotaHistoryTransaction.html.abstract: Represents a Iota Bundle and all the reattaches, used to group all the txs in a single object.

Classes/IotaMultisig.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.name: validate(address:digests:)
Classes/IotaMultisig.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.abstract: Validates an address using digests as Trits.

Classes/IotaMultisig.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.name: validateSignature(signedBundle:inputAddress:)
Classes/IotaMultisig.html#/s:7IotaKit0A8.abstract: Validates the signature for a IOTA Bundle

Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C5debugS.name: debug
Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C5debugS.abstract: Debug variable, setting it to true, will enable the debug logging. Default false.

Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C8localP.name: localPoW
Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C8localP.abstract: Local PoW instance, setting it to nil will delegate the PoW to the node.

Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C12prefe.name: init(prefersHTTPS:_:)
Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C12prefe.abstract: Initializer for Iota class with automatic node selection.

Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C8balanc.name: balances(addresses:_:error:)
Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C8balanc.abstract: Returns the confirmed balance of the requested addresses.

Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C16findT.name: findTransactions(addresses:_:error:)
Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C16findT.abstract: Find the transactions which match the specified addresses.

Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C16findT.name: findTransactions(bundles:_:error:)
Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C16findT.abstract: Find the transactions which match the specified bundles.

Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C6trytes.name: trytes(hashes:_:error:)
Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C6trytes.abstract: Returns the raw transaction data (trytes) of a specific transaction. These trytes can then be easily converted into the actual transaction object. See IotaTransaction.

Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C11accou.name: accountData(seed:minimumNumberOfAddresses:security:requestTransactions:_:error:log:)
Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C11accou.abstract: returns the addresses, transfers, inputs and balance that are associated and have been used with your account (seed). This function is useful in getting all the relevant information of your account.

Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C14attac.name: attachToTangle(seed:index:security:_:error:)
Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C14attac.abstract: Attaches the specified address to the Tangle by doing Proof of Work.

Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C13sendT.name: sendTransfers(seed:security:depth:minWeightMagnitude:transfers:inputs:remainderAddress:reference:_:error:)
Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C13sendT.abstract: Wrapper function that basically does prepareTransfers, as well as attachToTangle and finally, it broadcasts and stores the transactions locally.

Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C12repla.name: replayBundle(tx:depth:minWeightMagnitude:_:error:)
Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C12repla.abstract: Takes a tail transaction hash as input, gets the bundle associated with the transaction and then replays the bundle by attaching it to the tangle.

Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C6bundle.name: bundle(tx:_:error:)
Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C6bundle.abstract: Returns the bundle with the specified where the specified tx hash belongs to.

Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C23trans.name: transactionsFromAddress(address:_:error:)
Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C23trans.abstract: Returns all the transactions associated to the specified address.

Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C19tailF.name: tailFromTransaction(tx:_:error:)
Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C19tailF.abstract: Returns the tail transaction from a transaction.

Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C15addre.name: addressFromHash(address:_:error:)
Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C15addre.abstract: Returns an IotaAddress instance, filled with all the transactions.

Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C21lates.name: latestInclusionStates(hashes:_:_:)
Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C21lates.abstract: Get the inclusion states of a set of transactions. This is for determining if a transaction was accepted and confirmed by the network or not.

Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C22wereA.name: wereAddressesSpentFrom(addresses:_:_:)
Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C22wereA.abstract: Check if a list of addresses was ever spent from, in the current epoch, or in previous epochs.

Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C12isPro.name: isPromotable(tail:_:_:)
Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C12isPro.abstract: Checks if a bundle is promotable by checking the tx tail of the bundle.

Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C18promo.name: promoteTransaction(hash:transactions:depth:minWeightMagnitude:delayInSeconds:numberOfPromotes:_:error:)
Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C18promo.abstract: Promotes a transaction by spamming the network (convenience method).

Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C18promo.name: promoteTransaction(_:transactions:depth:minWeightMagnitude:delayInSeconds:numberOfPromotes:_:error:)
Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C18promo.abstract: Promotes a transaction by spamming the network.

Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C7promot.name: promote(tail:transactions:depth:minWeightMagnitude:delayInSeconds:numberOfPromotes:_:error:)
Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C7promot.abstract: Promotes a transaction by spamming the network (convenience method).

Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C10sendT.name: sendTrytes(trytes:depth:minWeightMagnitude:reference:_:error:)
Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C10sendT.abstract: Wrapper function that does attachToTangle and finally, it broadcasts and stores the transactions.

Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C14attac.name: attachToTangle(trunkTx:branchTx:minWeightMagnitude:trytes:_:error:)
Classes/Iota.html#/s:7IotaKit0A0C14attac.abstract: Attaches the specified address to the Tangle by doing Proof of Work.
